design_philosophy.core_concept: Apple Glass x Institutional Trading. A cockpit for high-precision execution.
design_philosophy.aesthetics: Dark, Glassmorphic, Minimal, Data-First. No gradients, no noise, just pure signal.
rules: NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS EVER. Body is fixed at #191919.
NO GRADIENTS. Flat colors or glass only.
Glass panels must use specific rgba(0,0,0,0.18) + blur(12px).
Mobile-first always. Desktop is just a centered mobile view (max 560px).

GlassPanel.styles: bg-crtv-glass backdrop-blur-glass border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-lg
GlassPanel.usage: Use for ALL containers (Calculator, Calendar, Session Cards).

Input.styles: bg-black/20 border-white/5 text-white placeholder:text-white/20 focus:border-crtv-blue/50 focus:ring-0 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 font-mono

Button.styles: bg-crtv-blue text-white font-semibold rounded-xl hover:bg-crtv-blue/90 transition-colors h-12 active:scale-95 transition-transform

BottomNav.styles: fixed bottom-0 w-full max-w-[560px] bg-[#191919]/90 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/5 flex justify-around py-4 z-50

Calendar.day_cell: aspect-square flex flex-col items-center justify-center rounded-lg relative

layout_structure.root: min-h-screen bg-[#191919] text-white flex justify-center font-sans overflow-x-hidden
layout_structure.container: w-full max-w-[560px] min-h-screen relative pb-32 px-5 pt-8 flex flex-col gap-6

universal_guidelines: Persist all state (calculator inputs, journal entries) to localStorage.
Use standard HTML/Tailwind for layout. Use Shadcn logic but CUSTOM styles matching the 'GlassPanel' look.
Calculator logic: MNQ/MES use standard multipliers. BTCUSD uses 1.
